attributes.action: Stop covid passports being rolled out which discriminate against the unvaxed.
attributes.additional_details:
This will create a huge divide between the vaccinated and unvaccinated.

It will affect many business’ as they will lose the custom of the unvaccinated. 

Someone who is vaccinated can carry covid and spread this around. A negative test should be suffice for everyone. 

A vaccine should be a choice and there are people unable to have this vaccine. 

If a business decides to do this, let them. But do not make it compulsory and penalise business’ as well as mental health once more.
attributes.background:
The government plans to make covid passports compulsory for nightclubs and large venues , where a negative test will not be suffice. 

We have been fine for months without this & it is highly discriminatory and against human rights to demand such a thing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122
